Articles.Content:
Hello all.

I've been playing KSP over the course of a few months now, or at least since I downloaded it. Never once thought to come on the forums until the big Admin dude said some stuff about pre-orders. So I did, because I've been having a real blast with this game. Can't wait for the final release, all that jazz.

Glad to be here and I hope ya'll have been having as much fun as I have.

On that note, anyone know any recording program I can use to record the game and upload it to Youtube? I'd love to share the laughs I am experiencing.

Thanks.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

Thanks!

You have no idea how many happy and/or hilarious launchings I have had so far. This game alone has added fifty years to my life just by me laughing my butt off. I kid you not.

Try fraps to record

Thanks for the tip! I did so, recorded successfully and am currently uploading video to youtube. Hope to have it available soon! It also has live mission control commentary! Woohoo!
